item.title: KRL API - showcase
item.description: Disclaimer: This is not an attempt to prove or provide accurate scheduling or solving multi-million dollar problems that comes with public transportation sector, but rather a demonstration how a tiny subset of those problems can be approached. Background I've been looking for an actual real world scenario to create simple public API for a while, and this seems like as good as any to explore. Turns out commuter train's schedule in Jakarta is changing from time to time, averaging about 2-3 months each time.
